post.title: can you recommend me a wall mount?
post.content: hi, i know this is the wrong place to post but for some weird reason i cannot post in the tv wall mount section... i need to wall mount a panasonic th-42pe50b i don't no anything about wall mounts but was wondering which wall mount is compatible for my tv? i need it for about â£25 and from either amazon or ebay if possible. will this wall mount be suitable an fit comfortably to my tv? http://www.amazon.co.uk/duronic-plb1...7652944sr=8-5
